titleStmt.title: The names of the Lords spiritual and temporal who deserted, (not protested) against the vote in the House of Peers, the sixth instant, against the word abducated, and the throne vacant, in the same method as they entred their names in the journal book
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Lords.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
